## Atom

Class representing an atom.

### Parameters

-   `posX` **[number][50]** The x position of the nucleus of the atom. (optional, default `0`)
-   `posY` **[number][50]** The y position of the nucleus of the atom. (optional, default `0`)
-   `nucleusRadius` **[number][50]** The radius of the nucleus, in pixels. (optional, default `15`)
-   `rotsPerSec` **[number][50]** A constant that determines how fast the electrons move around their orbits. (optional, default `1`)
-   `electronCount` **[number][50]** The number of electrons in the atom. (optional, default `3`)
-   `tailSpheres` **[number][50]** The number of spheres that makes up each electron. (optional, default `15`)

### name

Gets the name of the atom (according to the periodic table).

Returns **[string][51]** 

### nucleusColor

Gets the color of the nucleus.

Returns **p5.Color** 

### nucleusColor

Sets the color of the nucleus.

#### Parameters

-   `newColor` **p5.Color** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### electronColor

Gets the color of the electrons.

Returns **p5.Color** 

### electronColor

Sets the color of the electrons.

#### Parameters

-   `newColor` **p5.Color** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### nucleusRadius

Gets the radius (in pixels) of the nucleus.

Returns **[number][50]** 

### nucleusRadius

Sets the radius (in pixels) of the nucleus.

#### Parameters

-   `newRadius` **[number][50]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### electronCount

Gets the current number of electrons in the atom.

Returns **[number][50]** 

### electronCount

Sets the current number of electrons in the atom.

#### Parameters

-   `newElectronCount` **[number][50]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### electronSpeed

Gets the orbital speed of the the electrons.

Returns **[number][50]** 

### electronSpeed

Sets the orbital speed of the electrons.

#### Parameters

-   `newSpeed` **[number][50]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### spinX

Gets whether spinning about the x-axis is enabled or disabled.

Returns **[boolean][53]** 

### spinX

Sets whether spinning about the x-axis is enabled or disabled.

#### Parameters

-   `newSpinX` **[boolean][53]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### spinY

Gets whether spinning about the y-axis is enabled or disabled.

Returns **[boolean][53]** 

### spinY

Sets whether spinning about the y-axis is enabled or disabled.

#### Parameters

-   `newSpinY` **[boolean][53]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### spinZ

Gets whether spinning about the z-axis is enabled or disabled.

Returns **[boolean][53]** 

### spinZ

Sets whether spinning about the z-axis is enabled or disabled.

#### Parameters

-   `newSpinZ` **[boolean][53]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### nucleusVibrate

Gets whether the nucleus is vibrating.

Returns **[boolean][53]** 

### nucleusVibrate

Sets whether the nucleus is vibrating.

#### Parameters

-   `newVal` **[boolean][53]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### electronVibrate

Gets whether the electrons are vibrating.

Returns **[boolean][53]** 

### electronVibrate

Sets whether the electrons are vibrating.

#### Parameters

-   `newVal` **[boolean][53]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### noise

Gets whether the nucleus has noise.

Returns **[boolean][53]** 

### noise

Sets whether the nucleus has noise.

#### Parameters

-   `newVal` **[boolean][53]** 

Returns **[undefined][52]** nothing

### counterX

Gets the counterX value.

Returns **[number][50]** \_counterX

### counterY

Gets the counterY value.

Returns **[number][50]** \_counterY

### counterZ

Gets the counterZ value.

Returns **[number][50]** \_counterZ

### generateRandoms

Generates 20 random rotations between 0 and 2Ï€.
These random rotations determine the starting location of each atom meaning that they are not all in sync.

#### Parameters

-   `numberOfRandoms` **[number][50]** 

### calcDeltaTime

Calculates the time passed between each call of draw().

Returns **[number][50]** 

### drawNucleus

Draws the nucleus to the canvas.

### drawElectrons

Draws the specified number of electrons to the canvas.

### drawElectron

Draws a specific electron and tail. Its position relative to other electrons is determined by the index of the electron.

#### Parameters

-   `index` **[number][50]** 

### drawOrbits

Draws the orbit for each electron onto the canvas.

#### Parameters

-   `thickness` **[number][50]** The thickness of the orbit.

### draw

Draws the nucleus, electrons and orbits to the canvas.
